md:
giải nghĩa từ "brushed" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Brushed (verb) : chải, quét, chà
	+ Meaning: to rub or move something gently over a surface, especially in order to clean or remove dirt.
	+ Example: She brushed her hair to remove the tangles.
	+ Related words: brush, brushing, brushes.

* Brushed (adjective) : đã chải, đã quét
	+ Meaning: having been cleaned or removed by rubbing or moving something gently over a surface.
	+ Example: The brushed floor was shiny and clean.
	+ Related words: brush, brushing, brushes.

* Brushed (past tense of "brush") : đã chải, đã quét
	+ Meaning: to have rubbed or moved something gently over a surface, especially in order to clean or remove dirt.
	+ Example: I brushed my teeth before going to bed.
	+ Related words: brush, brushing, brushes.

Note: The verb "brushed" can also be used in other contexts, such as in art or sports, but the meanings above are the most common ones.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "brushed" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Brushed (verb) : chải, quét, chà

    • Meaning: to rub or move something gently over a surface, especially in order to clean or remove dirt.
    • Example: She brushed her hair to remove the tangles.
    • Related words: brush, brushing, brushes.

  • Brushed (adjective) : đã chải, đã quét

    • Meaning: having been cleaned or removed by rubbing or moving something gently over a surface.
    • Example: The brushed floor was shiny and clean.
    • Related words: brush, brushing, brushes.

  • Brushed (past tense of "brush") : đã chải, đã quét

    • Meaning: to have rubbed or moved something gently over a surface, especially in order to clean or remove dirt.
    • Example: I brushed my teeth before going to bed.
    • Related words: brush, brushing, brushes.

Note: The verb "brushed" can also be used in other contexts, such as in art or sports, but the meanings above are the most common ones.
